DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate effect G-CSF administration septic neonate neutrophil production CD11b expression .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Recombinant Human Granulocyte Colony- Stimulating Factor CD11b Septic Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: Neonates susceptible septicemia secondary quantitative qualitative neutrophilic defect . Granulocyte-colony stimulating factor ( G-CSF ) stimulate myeloid progenitor cell proliferation induces selective neutrophil function .
DOC.criteria: newborn infant postnatal age < 28 day , minimum gestational age 28 week require intensive care clinical sign consistent diagnosis neonatal sepsis , without neutropenia neonate congenital malformation , major chromosomal abnormality , prior use cytokine intravenous immunoglobulin , decrease hemoglobin and/or hematocrit level necessitate transfusion
